attributes.action: That David Cameron apologises for his inheritance being increased by using tax avoidance and repays what is owed to the public purse
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Cameron has stated that it is morally wrong for anyone to use tax avoidance techniques in order to reduce their tax liability. It is reported that his family inheritance, was passed onto him by using such a tax avoidance technique in order to reduce the tax paid.
He should now do the morally correct thing, apologise for this error of judgement and have calculated what ought to have been paid and repay that amount to the public purse.
